attributes.action: End the violent oppression in Ukraine
attributes.additional_details:
The violent oppression of government opposition in Ukraine must be stopped.

The UK Government, as a major world power must show that it is on the side of a democratic public who are listened to by their leaders.

The UK Government must declare that is strongly opposed to the violent suppression of protests against the Ukrainian government and should, where appropriate, impose sanctions upon those deemed responsible for the violence.
